extendedInfo.description: AniWorld is a free fun game designed for your kid to learn more about animals in an interactive enjoyable way. Your kid would love this game and will learn more about animals and their habitat.Join more than 100,000 others who downloaded this game and enjoy every minute of it.Reviews from leading sites:TechRadar â (10 best free Android apps for kids) - excellent app for kids aged one to five. It teaches kids the names of different animals and gives them a chance to feed and pet them.DigitalTrends â (Best Android apps for kids) - The name of the animal followed by the sound it makes is played when they tap to choose one. They can also see pictures of it as it grows, find out where it lives, try feeding it different options to see what it eats, and pet it for a surprise comedy effect.*** 36 different fun animals to choose from*** 250 different pictures For each animal you have the next options:â¢ Animal home **************The kid can see the animal home and discover where the animal rests. Educate your kid about the animal natural environment. In the background you can hear the sound of the animal snoring with bed time music.â¢ Feed me **************In this section you can feed the animal by pressing or dragging one of three different food types. When the right food is selected, the picture is switching to see the animal eating. Choosing the wrong food the animal would end up with a ânoooâ sound.â¢ Pet Me **********In section the kid sees the animal heart on the left side of the screen. When the kid pet the animal the heart is filled with joy.Another fun effect is animal gargling and making fun animal sounds when the kid is petting it.When the heart is filled with joy (full red) the animal is rewarding the child by playing music and wearing effects for the joy of the kid.Your kid would love to explore the game to find different animals and morph.From birth to adult *******************The kid would see the animal grows from a baby to an adult animal. The kid can navigate between the phases by pressing the plus and minus buttons or by using the scroll mechanism.This part of the game invites you and your child to talk about growing up and the changes during the process.We at MToddlearn (Mobile toddler learning) created this fun game addressing kids in varies ages from 1.5 years old to five. We strive to create special appealing games that would address each of the age segments. As you would see, we have put a lot of thought in this fun game and consulted with child development specialist.  We hope your kids would find this game fun and educational. We would love to hear comment and suggestion at mtoddlearn@gmail.com we will answer any mail rapidly.Thanks MToddlearn team Tags : Free, Fun, Game, Cool, Games, Kids, Kid,  Pet, Petme, Pet Me, animals, animal, fun game, fun game for kids, kids game, animal sounds, free games for kids, petting, animals, love, care, enjoy, Aniworld, Aniworld-lite, child, children, Games, school, Preschool, kindergarten,  Preschool-aged, Free, Fun, Games, Interactive

reviews.title: Aniworld
reviews.comment: It\'s a cute app my 2 yr old loves it. The only problem I hav with it is that you have a pic of a rooster...it makes the rooster noise but the game says its a chicken.
reviews.author: Kelly Smith

reviews.title: Awesome . My kids love it
reviews.comment: amazing - my kids plays all the time. Pet me so funny they pet again and again. Wait for more animals :-) thanks.  now can buy the full version , thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Vibration cannot be off
reviews.comment: Good and I would buy the pro version if it was possible to switch off the vibration

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy 2 skyrocket
reviews.comment: Says cannot save to USB or SD card...broke my daughters heart!! Please fix ASAP!!

reviews.title: The only flaw .Stroking for heart
reviews.comment: Very good except for stroking the animal, sometimes has STUPID and SCARY graphics. Stroking animal should be Cute ovelays instead. Not suitable for 3year old Option to turn scary ness off needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overpriced
reviews.comment: My daughter likes the game, but it\'s heavily overpriced. There is no complexity in it, my opinion is that fair price is about one tenth of what they are charging.

reviews.comment: My kids love it! My only concern is that the first goose picture looks like an Indian Runner Duck...
